name: Space Shooter
tagline: A Space Based,Dungeon Crawling,Top Down,Shooting Game...
body:
## Welcome to Space Shooter's Project Page

This is the project page for Space Shooter, my month 3 1GAM project.
The Name Space Shooter is possibly a little misleading.
The Game I have planned is a Dungeon Crawler type game, but set on a Space Ship.
I plan to have a top down view, with LOTS of enemies and lots of projectiles.
I would like to create a challenging game.

### Plans
I plan to implement, several different enemy types.
I plan to add level randomisation to give some replay-ability.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
